items.sentence: I can\'t imagine why anyone would want to steal something like that.
I think it\'d be better if you didn\'t go drinking with Tom tonight.
How many young people do you know that own as many cars as Tom does?
I called you three or four times, but you never answered your phone.
I heard that Tom was working late last night with you. Is that true?
Tom wondered how his ex-wife and her new husband were getting along.
Tom wrote his name on every dirty car windshield in the parking lot.
She always says nice things about him, especially when he\'s around.
Tom watched the tadpoles swimming in the jar that he\'d put them in.
I chained myself to one of the trees they were planning to cut down.
